competition_summary.context: competition in generation, supply, and distribution, including new technologies and their declining costs; • the impact and effectiveness of vegetation management programs; • the potential for reliability issues due to inadequate resources resulting from the retirement of fossil-fuel-fired and nuclear generation facilities as they are replaced with renewable energy generation sources, market inefficiencies related to prices for purchased power, capacity, and ancillary services, and other factors
